And by the way the presences of the Angelions in both demisions shows 
the 2 deminsions are similar. So it would be stupid if the 2 versions 
of Cybertron were not similar (and the capitol city is still 
Cybertropolis).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Sure we can accept him without acknowledging BM. He comes from 
> an alternate dimension apparently. Yep, and as for destroyng the 
> evidence... well thats not going to happen. Very bad choice for a 
> location to crash a ship.
> 
> IC:
> As Optimus Fury's ship heads towards what looks to be its 
> destruction. A beam pierces the ocean and engulfs the ship and 
> quickly balances it. A moment later the ship dissapears calmly 
> beneath the water as it is dragged by the tractor to its source... 
At 
> the same time inside of the Oblivion, Optimus Furys signature 
appears 
> on the screen since he decided to land on a deserted for now island 
> that the massive ship happened to be off the shore of.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > OOC: So like they say my friends you lose.
> > 
> > BIC: A shuttle from the future, in the Angelions time comes out of 
> > transwarp space. A beam shoots towards Africa and scans a black 
> > panther. Inside the bot is given this beast mode and REFORMATED. 
He 
> > has the same weapons as Optimus Prime in BM except he can only 
> > partially absorb the weapons fire. He opens a com link to his own 
> > time.
> > 
> > Bot: This is Optimus Fury. I am proceeding toward the inferior 
> > Angilions. They will agree to be reformatted or they will join 
> > millions of "accidental" deaths since the Maxis and Preds hunted 
> down 
> > and destroyed Cheetor's team and killed most of there followers in 
> > attempts to deformat them. Because we are the Malacons. We live in 
> > secret, and destroy those inferior to us.
> > 
> > Comm: Good. Don't return without a prize, reformatted or dead. 
Soon 
> > with a little elbow grease (lol) we will be 2% of the population 
> and 
> > the Angelions will still be clueless about us.
> > 
> > He proceeds to "destroy the evidense" by aiming his shuttle at the 
> > Atlantic Ocean and parachuting out over England. When he lands he 
> > goes to Beast Mode.
> > 
> > OF: Stealth Mode.
> > 
> > Holograms make him look like a real panther.
> > 
> > OOC: I made sure he wasn't illegal, but you can't accept him 
> without 
> > BM. Try to denig it now.
